Today, Dan and Jordan attempt to record a little minisode from different countries.  While Jordan has been out of town, Dan found a few clips from 1998 that the world needs to hear, which illustrate how little Alex has really changed over the past 23 years.

==Tidbits==

*Jordan is in a bathroom in France
*Clips from 6/30/98
*Alex's show: exposing corruption
*The IRS tried to steal Alex's grandparents' humble home
*Alex loses his shit on a caller
*Caller criticizes Alex's sources, Alex storms off the set
*Stay out of the control room
*Alex isn't mad at the crew
